WrenchBar >> Greasings N Salivations!

Tooling all manner of human powered contraptions, one thing stays the same: The machine needs an experienced human touch - and bringing it with all thre right twists and torsions, that takes a lifetime of cylcing love. It could even be that Barry White is playing in the background.

We have full time Shimano certified mechanics. All in all, we have a combined experience of 80 years in the bicycle industry. Labor rates generally run at $65/hour. Free installations when bought at time of purchase. See our menu for more details!

WrenchBar Menu





Combo Platters ~ Tune-ups for riders of all levels

First Timer Tune-up:
Safety check, inspect and tighten all bolts, inflate tires to recommended PSI, lubricate chain. $15

Beginner Tune-up:
Adjust everything (headset, bottom bracket, front/rear drailleurs and brakes), bolt check, inflate tires, lubricate moving parts, wipe down frame, and safety inspection. $40

Sport Tune-up:
Everything in the Beginner Tune-up plus truing both wheels. $70

Expert Tune-up:
For those who need a little more attention. We'll remove the drive train, scrub it in the parts cleaner, install new cables and housing and, of course, adjust all moving parts. $125

Pro Build:
Build bike from frame up. $175

Prices Do Not Include Parts
